description:
A mysterious request to helm the upcoming sports festival arrives. The group must band together to figure out a way to pull it off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ainsi, leur fête ne connaîtra jamais de fin.
Dakara, Karera no Matsuri wa Owaranai.
Thus, Their Festival Will Never End.
だから, 彼らの祭りは終わらない.
